"...Ah, <%me>. Umm...": "1. Are you feeling alright?"
"2. It's good to see you're doing well."
"Ah, yeah. Aside from the recent events, I'm doing okay."
"Yup, I would say that it's thanks to you."
"...You're not surprised that I came here, it's like you already knew."
"M-more importantly, are you really okay? There weren't any more attacks from those Phantoms, right? We were really worried about you."
"...Worried? About me?"
"Of course! Even if it was just a short while, we were comrades in battle!"
"We've taken measures to ensure your safety, but our hands are tied... It sure is reassuring to see you in person."
"By the way, Hitsugi. You mentioned something about having questions?"
"I, Xiera, will do all that I can to answer any questions that you may have!"
"In that case, I've always wanted to ask... ...Are you all \"Bugs\"... Wai- That's not it! Umm... Aah..."
"Mmn, aah, nope, wait... How do I phrase this..?"
"\"Are you human?\" Well of course you are... \"Where did you come from\"... That would be here."
"Oh, come on! There's too many things to ask! Where do I even start?!"
"How about \"Aru\", the boy who's with you at the moment Hitsugi?"
"That's it! That too! ...Wait, how did you know about Aru's name?"
"Anyways, let's start there! Who is Aru? What is he? Is he human? Did he come from this world?"
"Or is he something else?!"
"...I'm sorry, but we do not have enough data to give you a concise answer."
"No way..."
"1. What do you think about him, Hitsugi?"
"2. What do you want him to be, Hitsugi?"
"...Me? What do I think about Aru?"
"What do I want him to be...?"
"He... He's a bug. Everyone's supposed to be a bug. That's what Mother said, and that should be it..."
"Was that really all there is to it...?"
"...Sorry. My thoughts are all a mess right now. I can't think straight. "
"I need some time to figure this out. I'll be heading home for the day."
"...Okay. Please feel free to visit anytime, Hitsugi."
"...I will. Thanks Xiera, <%me>."
